main event: A ball of bright red fire was observed for about 3 seconds before it exploded and faded out at Donaldson AFB.
interesting points: The observation lasted for only 3 seconds, The object left a slight trail of fire before exploding, After the explosion, the object moved toward the ground, The case is listed as a sighting with insufficient data for evaluation, Tower personnel believed it could possibly have been a meteorite but found it much brighter than a typical meteorite.
sighted object: a ball of bright red fire
witness description: Tower personnel at Donaldson AFB, deemed very reliable.
